item.description:
Hi Everyone!!!!

I know....FINALLY....our next meeting scheduled for the 22nd, will be at the Grand Canal,

located at 57 Canal Street, downtown Boston, between Chapel Pl & Market St.  For those

who wish to take public transportation, the nearest T station is Haymarket Station - Outbound

(Orange Line) Haymarket Station - Inbound (Orange Line).  When you come into the Grand

Canal, you want to take a right and go down a small set of stairs and we'll be meeting in that area.

As for parking, unfortunately I could not find a venue that had free parking and to be located in

the downtown Boston area.  The Grand Canal is located very close to the T.  So I hope that helps

those who are concerned about parking.

A couple of things:

1.  Please make sure to take care of your bill before you leave if you choose to order something.  I took care of a bill that was not paid by someone.  It does not look good for the group when this happens.

2.  Starting at the next meetup, the fee will be collected at the beginning of the meeting.  I've discovered that this is the norm and easier to keep track of things.

 

If you have any questions, please let me know.

Thank you so much for your patience and understanding.

-Ozzie
item.how_to_find_us: Send a text to Ozzie at 617.594.6730
item.name: Boston Independent Filmmakers Group
